Invalid task data: data must be an object
Invalid task data: title must be a non-empty string
Invalid task data: description must be a string if present
Invalid task data: completed must be a boolean
Invalid task data: isPriority must be a boolean
Invalid task data: userId must be a non-empty string
Invalid task data: createdAt must be a valid timestamp
Invalid task data: updatedAt must be a valid timestamp
Invalid task data: dueDate must be a Date object if present
Invalid task data: reminderMinutes must be a valid number if present
Invalid task data: repeat must be an object with frequency and interval if present
Invalid task data: repeat frequency must be one of daily, weekly, or monthly if present
Invalid task data: repeat interval must be a valid number if present
